data.body: Create server-side registry module at src/lib/registry.ts. Persists registered repo paths to ~/.config/foolery/registry.json. Functions: loadRegistry, saveRegistry, addRepo (validates .beads/ exists), removeRepo, listRepos. Uses node:fs/promises.
